name: Relaxed
desc: The person isn't suffering from anything

name: Paralyzed
desc: The person is in shock and unable to move

name: Energized
desc: The person becomes more energized and can perform more actions per turn

desc: The person becomes more energized and can perform more actions per turn

name: Overclocked
desc: Tired from a neverending job, but determined to carry on. 4 turns each time.

desc: It was never enough. Perhaps the 6 hour clock will help.
